name: test-driven-architecture
description: This package generates architectural tests from solution definitions

scripts.w: rm -rf dist && clear && tsc && DEBUG=example node dist/index.js -s ./solution/solution1.json -e ./solution/environments.json -o build/summary.html
scripts.wsimple: rm -rf dist && clear && tsc && DEBUG=tda,denormalizer node dist/index.js -t ./data/typetests.json -s ./data/solution1.json -e ./data/architecture2.json -o build/summary.html
